p: The participants who viewed an instructional video in Peru were observed to be more confident and proficient in applying the device compared to those only using written information: “With the instructions I can do it, but with the video it is better” (FGD with community members inside study zone in Iquitos). We observed that those who saw the video prior to device use only referred to written instructions as a reminder of the steps versus others who depended exclusively on the written instructions for each step. Participants mentioned that illiterate users would need very clear picture instructions.
